LABEL: 0x2D1
STRING: 「This is delicious!」

LABEL: 0x306
STRING: 「You're right... The taste itself is ordinary, but since I don't usually eat something like this, it's pretty exceptional.」

LABEL: 0x355
STRING: On the way back after safely delivering breakfast to Reiri, I heard the girls' charming voices.

LABEL: 0x3A5
STRING: Listening to them talk like this you would think they were old friends or something.

LABEL: 0x3F1
STRING: But... what was that about an ordinary taste?

LABEL: 0x41D
STRING: I knew there was something wrong with Tokiwa already... but I didn't realize that even Touri was contaminated.

LABEL: 0x477
STRING: Maybe they both got hit by some unknown virus.

LABEL: 0x4B7
STRING: Their taste buds were incomprehensible, to say the least.

LABEL: 0x4E5
STRING: The first thing that caught my eye when I got back

LABEL: 0x525
STRING: was the sight of everyone, including Hiragino who was supposed to have been cleaning up a moment ago, enjoying their food.

LABEL: 0x587
STRING: This was...

LABEL: 0x59F
STRING: Hiragino... Not you too.

LABEL: 0x5BF
STRING: I slumped my shoulders in despair.

LABEL: 0x5E5
STRING: Hiragino noticed me standing there in shock.

LABEL: 0x6FA
STRING: 「What's up? You sure got back quickly.」

LABEL: 0x737
STRING: 「Ah, лл-san.」

LABEL: 0x755
STRING: 「If you don't hurry, your portion of the dessert will get eaten too.」

LABEL: 0x7A2
STRING: Two beckoning hands.

LABEL: 0x7BC
STRING: It was no use... They were completely corrupted.

LABEL: 0x7E8
STRING: That unearthly-colored Chicken Sandwich (temporary) was a bio-weapon, after all.

LABEL: 0x848
STRING: That was why Hiragino, who finished the thing out of a sense of obligation, was...

LABEL: 0x87C
STRING: I see, so sooner or later, I too would――

LABEL: 0x8A4
STRING: Yes, it was already too late.

LABEL: 0x8CC
STRING: My taste buds have already been contaminated.

LABEL: 0x906
STRING: I was doomed to feast my eyes and mouth on the dessert of horror they had concocted...

LABEL: 0x99C
STRING: ――Haha.

LABEL: 0x9B4
STRING: If it was already too late... there was nothing to fear anymore.

LABEL: 0x9F0
STRING: No matter what kind of unidentifiable dessert, even if it was the eyeball of a deep-sea fish, I would eat it with delight.

LABEL: 0xA50
STRING: And as I took the first step forward, I was sure my back must have been filled with a sense of sadness.

LABEL: 0xAA6
STRING: This was a fitting end for me.

LABEL: 0xAD2
STRING: Farewell, my friends――

LABEL: 0xBD6
STRING: 「Delicious! Another one, please!」

LABEL: 0xBFE
STRING: I felt like the scales had fallen from my eyes.

LABEL: 0xC32
STRING: I never realized there was such delicious food in this world.

LABEL: 0xC72
STRING: I couldn't help but feel foolish for not having noticed it before.

LABEL: 0xCBA
STRING: I finished one in no time, and now it was time for my third.

LABEL: 0xD76
STRING: 「You're still going to eat more...?」

LABEL: 0xD9E
STRING: 「You're not eating too much, are you?」

LABEL: 0xE3A
STRING: 「Now, now. Let the man eat.」

LABEL: 0xE70
STRING: 「There's more than we can eat anyway.」

LABEL: 0xEA6
STRING: 「Oh, and by the way, one more for me too.」

LABEL: 0xEDB
STRING: Yukari gave him a puzzled look after Hiragino shrewdly asked for one more portion.

LABEL: 0xF8D
STRING: 「Sheesh... Get yourselves together.」

LABEL: 0xFC9
STRING: 「"Preserved food" isn't something you should gorge on.」

LABEL: 0x1012
STRING: She placed a can in front us both while saying so.

LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: Yukari... What a fine person.

LABEL: 0x108A
STRING: As we opened our cans, the sweet aroma of fruit leaked out from within.

LABEL: 0x10DC
STRING: The soft white flesh visible on the inside was appetizing as well.

LABEL: 0x111E
STRING: 「Thanks for the food!」

LABEL: 0x114F
STRING: 「Itadakimasu.」

LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: And so we began to eat.

LABEL: 0x119E
STRING: Our savior's name was "canned peaches."

LABEL: 0x12BF
STRING: 「Canned peaches?」

LABEL: 0x12DB
STRING: 「Are they... normal?」

LABEL: 0x1301
STRING: When I was told that our dessert was canned peaches, I had to ask.

LABEL: 0x1343
STRING: It was not that I was dissatisfied, far from it.

LABEL: 0x1385
STRING: Canned fruit for dessert sounded too proper, so... that was why I had my doubts.

LABEL: 0x13E1
STRING: There was no way the ladies who created that blue devil could prepare something decent like that.

LABEL: 0x14AF
STRING: 「Yes, that's what I thought too.」

LABEL: 0x1564
STRING: 「I unintentionally heard them talking, you see.」

LABEL: 0x159A
STRING: 「"Huh, are you the type of person who puts mayonnaise on everything?"」

LABEL: 0x15E8
STRING: 「"I'm not saying it's bad, but I don't think that's normal?"

LABEL: 0x1693
STRING: ...Something like that.」

LABEL: 0x16B6
STRING: 「That's... Thank you for your hard work.」

LABEL: 0x17B9
STRING: And so we ate our fill.

LABEL: 0x17E9
STRING: We gobbled up the canned peaches.

LABEL: 0x180B
STRING: Tasty or tasteless, hungry or full... all such things were trivial matters.

LABEL: 0x1861
STRING: I just wanted to erase the memory of that horrific breakfast from my mind.

LABEL: 0x1A0C
STRING: 「Well then...」

LABEL: 0x1A2D
STRING: After we calmed down, Yukari spoke up.

LABEL: 0x1A6C
STRING: 「――Let's confirm our current status, shall we?」

LABEL: 0x1A9F
STRING: Current status...

LABEL: 0x1AB9
STRING: It was a common phrase, however...

LABEL: 0x1AEF
STRING: My thoughts, which had been immersed in this temporary daily routine, were instantly pulled back to reality.

LABEL: 0x1B39
STRING: Immersed in routine?

LABEL: 0x1BD0
STRING: ――There was no way that such peace could last.

LABEL: 0x1C02
STRING: The ＜SHEEP III> was still sunk at the bottom of the sea in the middle of nowhere.

LABEL: 0x1C51
STRING: With no way to contact anyone, completely separated from others...

LABEL: 0x1C9B
STRING: If even one person mentioned yesterday's accident,

LABEL: 0x1CDD
STRING: or if someone voiced their complaints,

LABEL: 0x1D13
STRING: we were forced to face... reality.

LABEL: 0x1D51
STRING: I... No, we were just fooling ourselves.

LABEL: 0x1D89
STRING: More than necessary, to the point of excess, just to forget this unacceptable reality.

LABEL: 0x1DD5
STRING: Acting out fun routines, pretending, and laughing with each other.

LABEL: 0x1E0B
STRING: We couldn't keep that up forever.

LABEL: 0x1E47
STRING: No one could―not even me.

LABEL: 0x1E65
STRING: I... had to face it.

LABEL: 0x1EF0
STRING: This feeling in my chest that I pretended to forget.

LABEL: 0x1F92
STRING: 「Let's start with a report.」

LABEL: 0x1FB7
STRING: Yukari told us about several things.

LABEL: 0x1FE1
STRING: About the situation of the <SHEEP III>, the degree of restoration of the systems, the amount of power remaining...

LABEL: 0x2038
STRING: She told us, but there was still little new information.

LABEL: 0x20A5
STRING: 「Hwaaah――」

LABEL: 0x20C4
STRING: Next to her, Tokiwa made no attempt to hide her boredom.

LABEL: 0x20FE
STRING: To begin with, you couldn't expect anything significant to change in our situation in half a day.

LABEL: 0x2142
STRING: The fact that the situation was this stable was great on its own.

LABEL: 0x219C
STRING: But whether things were good or bad and how the listener perceived them were two separate issues.

LABEL: 0x21EE
STRING: Yukari didn't chide Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x2226
STRING: To me, it seemed like she wasn't talking to any of us.

LABEL: 0x2272
STRING: It was just a report that she was reiterating to herself.

LABEL: 0x2323
STRING: Yukari kept talking, her eyes cast down on the memo in her hands.

LABEL: 0x2359
STRING: As the person in charge of this ship, she must have lost a great deal in this accident.

LABEL: 0x23B3
STRING: Depending on how you looked at it, she might be the biggest victim out of everyone.

LABEL: 0x23E3
STRING: She had been in the wheelhouse since early morning.

LABEL: 0x240D
STRING: Was that routine a form of salvation for her as well?

LABEL: 0x244B
STRING: Or what was she thinking when she saw us closing our eyes from reality?

LABEL: 0x250B
STRING: 「The negative tank is almost completely damaged and unusable.」

LABEL: 0x2557
STRING: 「Fortunately, the main tank is intact, so we tried an emergency blow.」

LABEL: 0x25B5
STRING: 「As you can see, the results were... not enough to get the buoyancy back since the rear is almost fully submerged.」

LABEL: 0x2625
STRING: 「Are there any questions so far?」

LABEL: 0x2725
STRING: 「I get that this ship is not able to surface.」

LABEL: 0x2769
STRING: 「But what was the cause?」

LABEL: 0x2795
STRING: 「How could this happen to a state-of-the-art submersible like this?」

LABEL: 0x2851
STRING: 「――I have a hypothesis.」

LABEL: 0x287A
STRING: A moment later, the mood changed.

LABEL: 0x2987
STRING: 「What did you figure out?」

LABEL: 0x29BA
STRING: 「Well, this is just a guess...」

LABEL: 0x2A21
STRING: Everyone was listening to Yukari's next words.

LABEL: 0x2ABD
STRING: 「The cause of the accident, I'm afraid...」

LABEL: 0x2AEB
STRING: 「...Was a methane hydrate explosion.」

LABEL: 0x2B28
STRING: Methane hydrate...?

LABEL: 0x2B4E
STRING: I think I'd heard about that while I was an undergraduate.

LABEL: 0x2B80
STRING: I never thought I would hear it again here.

LABEL: 0x2BD6
STRING: But... Methane hydrate, huh...?

LABEL: 0x2C0C
STRING: That would explain the unusual shock.

LABEL: 0x2D11
STRING: 「Methane... I see.」

LABEL: 0x2D3C
STRING: Next to him, Tokiwa was silently staring into empty space. It was as if she was checking her own theory against Yukari's words.

LABEL: 0x2D9E
STRING: ...Did Tokiwa know about this already?

LABEL: 0x2DD0
STRING: Or did she realize it just now?

LABEL: 0x2DF2
STRING: It was by no means impossible... If that was the case, why did she keep quiet?

LABEL: 0x2E7E
STRING: What was she thinking?

LABEL: 0x2EA2
STRING: What was she up to――?

LABEL: 0x2EF4
STRING: While everyone else was lost in thought, a single slender arm was raised gently.

LABEL: 0x2FFF
STRING: 「What is it, Touri-san?」

LABEL: 0x3038
STRING: 「Uhmm, you see...」

LABEL: 0x305A
STRING: 「What's methane hydrate?」

LABEL: 0x3097
STRING: Touri asked unsurely.

LABEL: 0x30BB
STRING: It was not a word you'd use normally, so it was no wonder she didn't know about it.

LABEL: 0x3125
STRING: But if one were interested in energy issues, they might've heard of it.

LABEL: 0x3173
STRING: But as a normal high school girl, the word was probably unfamiliar to her.

LABEL: 0x3247
STRING: 「Ah, I see.」

LABEL: 0x326B
STRING: 「I was careless. My apologies.」

LABEL: 0x32A8
STRING: Yukari, who had been making a resolute report as the chief attendant, seemed to have been caught by surprise by Touri's question.

LABEL: 0x337A
STRING: 「Methane hydrate――」

LABEL: 0x33B1
STRING: She quickly switched to teacher mode and began explaining to Touri.

LABEL: 0x3410
STRING: 「Methane hydrate is a type of fossil fuel like oil and coal, and is currently being researched for practical use.」

LABEL: 0x3492
STRING: 「It's also called "burning ice" because it looks like ice and burns when lit on fire.」

LABEL: 0x355A
STRING: 「"Burning ice"... I think I've read about that somewhere.」

LABEL: 0x35A9
STRING: 「It's formed of "Marine Snow," aka dead plankton that has piled up on the bottom of the sea.」

LABEL: 0x3607
STRING: 「In the deep sea at a depth of around 500 to 1000 meters...」

LABEL: 0x3638
STRING: 「But, it's known to exist even tens to hundreds of meters below the surface.」

LABEL: 0x36EF
STRING: 「Ah, so during the dive...」

LABEL: 0x3726
STRING: 「That's when the <SHEEP III> lost control...」

LABEL: 0x375D
STRING: 「We just happened to dive into a layer of methane hydrate buildup.」

LABEL: 0x37AB
STRING: 「Stable conditions for methane hydrate are very strict at low temperatures and high pressure...」

LABEL: 0x37FB
STRING: 「That state of stability collapsed in a chain event under the impact of the submarine's entry.」

LABEL: 0x3885
STRING: 「And so――」

LABEL: 0x38BE
STRING: Yukari spoke hesitantly and held her tongue.

LABEL: 0x38EC
STRING: But no one urged her to continue.

LABEL: 0x3922
STRING: Everyone imagined it and remembered.

LABEL: 0x39B5
STRING: Collapsing methane hydrate.

LABEL: 0x39DF
STRING: Shock waves traveling through the sea with terrifying force.

LABEL: 0x3A0F
STRING: Crushed rocks smashing against the acrylic glass, one after another.

LABEL: 0x3A57
STRING: Until finally――

LABEL: 0x3B38
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x3B5D
STRING: Yukari who broke the silence.

LABEL: 0x3C4B
STRING: It was not the teacher-like tone we heard earlier, nor was it the dignified tone of a chief attendant.

LABEL: 0x3CA1
STRING: She was biting her lip, holding back, and muttering...

LABEL: 0x3CDD
STRING: It was painful to look at.

LABEL: 0x3D0E
STRING: 「I'm sorry. I'm sorry it's to come to this.」

LABEL: 0x3D4F
STRING: There was no hiding the regret in her voice.

LABEL: 0x3D75
STRING: Touri tried to say something to her, but in the end, couldn't.

LABEL: 0x3DC1
STRING: Everyone sank into silence.

LABEL: 0x3DF3
STRING: No one uttered a word... And, of course, neither did I.

LABEL: 0x3E19
STRING: But I had a different reason for keeping quiet.

LABEL: 0x3ED6
STRING: ――Why?

LABEL: 0x3EEE
STRING: Why would Yukari apologize?

LABEL: 0x3F1C
STRING: That was something that I should have said.

LABEL: 0x3F4C
STRING: Why was she willing to take it all on herself?

LABEL: 0x3F84
STRING: All the responsibility, all the guilt...

LABEL: 0x3FB0
STRING: Then, who should I apologize to?

LABEL: 0x3FDE
STRING: Who would forgive me――?

LABEL: 0x4017
STRING: 「――But, it's okay.」

LABEL: 0x40FC
STRING: Facing up, Yukari continued in a moderately cheerful voice.

LABEL: 0x4141
STRING: 「We have a good chance of making contact with the surface soon, isn't that right?」

LABEL: 0x4190
STRING: She looked my way.

LABEL: 0x41B6
STRING: ...Was I supposed to announce it?

LABEL: 0x41DC
STRING: I was a little reluctant to continue after her report...

LABEL: 0x423A
STRING: If anyone was responsible for our situation, it was definitely me.

LABEL: 0x427A
STRING: Well... it couldn't be helped.

LABEL: 0x4372
STRING: 「It's not that the communications are disconnected, or that the system has crashed...」

LABEL: 0x43D4
STRING: 「It's just taking a nap... in a manner of speaking.」

LABEL: 0x4404
STRING: 「Right now, the communication system is in a state of temporary "sleep."」

LABEL: 0x4448
STRING: 「――Do you get what I'm trying to say?」

LABEL: 0x4472
STRING: I looked around at everyone.

LABEL: 0x458A
STRING: While everyone else nodded their heads in a reasonable manner, only Tokiwa tilted her head with a question mark on top of her head.

LABEL: 0x45EE
STRING: ...Well, if it was only her, that was fine...

LABEL: 0x46BE
STRING: 「So, when is it coming back?」

LABEL: 0x46EF
STRING: 「Ah, yes.」

LABEL: 0x4711
STRING: 「The communication system will be restored at 13:00 today.」

LABEL: 0x475F
STRING: 13:00―everyone looked at the clock on the wall.

LABEL: 0x478B
STRING: A few more hours.

LABEL: 0x47A5
STRING: With just a little patience, we could make contact with the surface.

LABEL: 0x47DD
STRING: The sense of danger was already fading.

LABEL: 0x4803
STRING: In the relaxed atmosphere, I turned to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x4831
STRING: 「...That was fine, right?」

LABEL: 0x48C5
STRING: 「Yes, thank you.」

LABEL: 0x494E
STRING: 「The transmitters and receivers were prepared in both the front and rear sections.」

LABEL: 0x4990
STRING: 「So any communication equipment here should be undamaged...」

LABEL: 0x49D0
STRING: 「In other words――」

LABEL: 0x49FB
STRING: 「We can call the surface for rescue...」

LABEL: 0x4A9A
STRING: 「Is that what you mean?」

LABEL: 0x4ACB
STRING: Yukari smiled at her.

LABEL: 0x4BBC
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x4BD2
STRING: 「And since there was an unnatural loss of communication last night, the search must have already begun.」

LABEL: 0x4C83
STRING: We turned to the wall clock.

LABEL: 0x4CA1
STRING: The time was already nearly 9:30.

LABEL: 0x4CC6
STRING: As Yukari had said, it had been almost half a day since we lost contact with the ground,

LABEL: 0x4D13
STRING: and since our ship sunk to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x4D35
STRING: Moreover, it had happened in the middle of the night.

LABEL: 0x4D53
STRING: Usually, night-time operations were prohibited for ordinary submarines since night-time navigation was so dangerous.

LABEL: 0x4DB7
STRING: Without an undersea base, it had not been possible to see the deep sea at night until now.

LABEL: 0x4E0F
STRING: In that respect, too, the <SHEEP III> was an innovative cruise submarine.

LABEL: 0x4E5A
STRING: And that submarine had lost contact.

LABEL: 0x4E82
STRING: The people involved probably still didn't even know what was going on.

LABEL: 0x4ED4
STRING: Even if they wanted to search, launching a boat at night could cause a secondary disaster.

LABEL: 0x4F20
STRING: ...However, that was why I chose this time of day.

LABEL: 0x4F62
STRING: The people on the surface must be desperate.

LABEL: 0x4F90
STRING: ――But for us, there was nothing to do but wait.

LABEL: 0x509B
STRING: 「Sunrise at this time of year is before 5:00.」

LABEL: 0x50CA
STRING: 「If the search began at dawn, more than four hours have already passed.」

LABEL: 0x512F
STRING: 「We could even be found before we're able to contact them.」

LABEL: 0x51F7
STRING: 「That's great...!」

LABEL: 0x521A
STRING: Touri raised her voice happily.

LABEL: 0x5242
STRING: I felt my face unintentionally break into a smile.

LABEL: 0x5270
STRING: Yes, with this, everything would return to normal for her.

LABEL: 0x52AA
STRING: If only we could make it to the surface, her sister should be safe too.

LABEL: 0x52E2
STRING: Even if she didn't know about Hikari, the dead girl who had called herself her sister.

LABEL: 0x53C9
STRING: 「――Well, I guess that's about it for now.」

LABEL: 0x53FF
STRING: 「Sensei, was there something else?」

LABEL: 0x5493
STRING: 「Just one thing from me.」

LABEL: 0x54BA
STRING: Hiragino glanced at Touri and opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x5533
STRING: 「It's about yesterday's incident with Reiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x55B9
STRING: Another incident that was on everyone's mind but couldn't talk about.

LABEL: 0x5683
STRING: Reiri, collapsed under the sprinklers.

LABEL: 0x56B7
STRING: Hiragino told everyone what he had explained to me last night.

LABEL: 0x56EF
STRING: In other words, that there was someone responsible for Reiri's current state.

LABEL: 0x5799
STRING: Hiragino did not, however, mention the possibility that the culprit was one of us.

LABEL: 0x57DB
STRING: ...Well, if the culprit was listening here, they wouldn't be able to get their hands on anyone again.

LABEL: 0x5945
STRING: 「...And that's about it.」

LABEL: 0x596D
STRING: 「I have one favor to ask of you all.」

LABEL: 0x599C
STRING: He raised his index finger and looked up at us with an earnest face.

LABEL: 0x59ED
STRING: 「From now on, don't leave anyone by themselves.」

LABEL: 0x5A33
STRING: 「Don't move alone... Especially you, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x5B0E
STRING: Touri made a strange sound as she was called out.

LABEL: 0x5B40
STRING: Hiragino placed his large palm on her shoulder and stared into her eyes.

LABEL: 0x5C51
STRING: 「Since Reiri-kun was targeted... I'm worried about you as well.」

LABEL: 0x5C91
STRING: 「Everyone else should look out for her too.」

LABEL: 0x5D25
STRING: I nodded deeply to no one in particular.

LABEL: 0x5D51
STRING: She got involved in all this because of me...

LABEL: 0x5D8F
STRING: Just the same, the accident was my fault.

LABEL: 0x5DBF
STRING: But after seeing her pale face yesterday, I couldn't deny that a special feeling had arisen within me.

LABEL: 0x5E2B
STRING: I had to protect her.

LABEL: 0x5E5D
STRING: I had to get her back to the surface safely, no matter what it took.

LABEL: 0x5EFF
STRING: 「...Don't worry. This is just a precaution.」

LABEL: 0x5F36
STRING: Hiragino smiled wryly and patted Touri on the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x5F72
STRING: Behind him, Yukari spoke up with a complicated look on her face.

LABEL: 0x604E
STRING: 「...But I believe we checked all the rooms yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x608C
STRING: 「There is no room for... Other than us, is there any room for other survivors to exist?」

LABEL: 0x60DB
STRING: ――Yukari's words served as a reminder.

LABEL: 0x611B
STRING: Yesterday. Immediately after the accident.

LABEL: 0x613B
STRING: In an attempt to search for those remaining in the front section, me and Yukari searched the third floor, while Touri and Hiragino searched the first floor, room by room.

LABEL: 0x61A9
STRING: Surely there was no space left for survivors to exist anywhere?

LABEL: 0x6261
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x6282
STRING: Hiragino scratched his head apologetically.

LABEL: 0x62BE
STRING: Unlike earlier, his tone was somewhat unclear.

LABEL: 0x6368
STRING: 「That's the thing. Actually, we haven't been able to check all the rooms properly.」

LABEL: 0x63B8
STRING: 「For example, the place that looked like a laboratory was completely locked and couldn't be opened at all.」

LABEL: 0x6411
STRING: I thought of the map of the first floor.

LABEL: 0x64FB
STRING: The research room was located next to the playroom.

LABEL: 0x652B
STRING: The ＜SHEEP III> was made ostensibly with tourism in mind, but it was also designed for long-term stays and experiments.

LABEL: 0x6592
STRING: The laboratory on the first floor was supposedly filled with experimental equipment comparable to surface research facilities.

LABEL: 0x65EE
STRING: For sure, that place was off-limits to the general public.

LABEL: 0x6636
STRING: I hadn't heard that the security was so strict that even Hiragino, a crew member, was barred entry.

LABEL: 0x6693
STRING: 「Just in case, all those rooms were checked by banging on the door from the outside to make sure there was no response.」

LABEL: 0x66E3
STRING: 「And I was told there are no research personnel on board this time, so that shouldn't be a problem――」

LABEL: 0x6756
STRING: 「That's true.」

LABEL: 0x6776
STRING: 「We don't even have all the research equipment in place yet.」

LABEL: 0x67D5
STRING: 「...What kind of experiments are you doing this deep in the sea?」

LABEL: 0x6824
STRING: 「Eh?」

LABEL: 0x68AB
STRING: Touri interjected suddenly.

LABEL: 0x68CD
STRING: Yukari faltered for a moment.

LABEL: 0x69BA
STRING: 「...On deep-sea ecosystems and energy.」

LABEL: 0x6A55
STRING: 「...Sorry, I don't have all the details.」

LABEL: 0x6AF7
STRING: 「Oh, no, if you don't know, then that's fine!」

LABEL: 0x6B35
STRING: 「Sorry, I know that was a weird thing to ask.」

LABEL: 0x6B6A
STRING: Touri shrank back like she was afraid.

LABEL: 0x6B9A
STRING: She must not have thought that her mere curiosity could cause so much consternation.

LABEL: 0x6C2C
STRING: Indeed. There was information about research and other topics that could be told to the outside world and some that couldn't.

LABEL: 0x6C7A
STRING: Most experiments, especially those breaking new ground, were not something you could talk about freely...

LABEL: 0x6CDD
STRING: I looked at Tokiwa unintentionally.

LABEL: 0x6D5E
STRING: When it came to experimentation, this girl was supposed to be a leading figure on the subject.

LABEL: 0x6D98
STRING: However, right now, she was looking ahead with unfocused eyes, oblivious to what Yukari and Hiragino were talking about.

LABEL: 0x6E1B
STRING: 「Ahem.」

LABEL: 0x6EF1
STRING: 「...Anyway, the research room was never opened.」

LABEL: 0x6F34
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x6F52
STRING: 「The research room has thicker doors to make the laboratory inside airtight.」

LABEL: 0x6FB2
STRING: 「Maybe your knocks weren't heard all the way inside.」

LABEL: 0x7004
STRING: 「We'll have to check there later.」

LABEL: 0x7063
STRING: 「Sorry for forgetting about it till now.」

LABEL: 0x70CA
STRING: Hiragino lowered his head and apologized.

LABEL: 0x70F4
STRING: Then, as if suddenly remembering something, he continued.

LABEL: 0x71FD
STRING: 「Oh, by the way, I didn't search every nook and cranny of the warehouse either.」

LABEL: 0x7256
STRING: 「The warehouse?」

LABEL: 0x727B
STRING: Hiragino nodded his head in reply.

LABEL: 0x72B8
STRING: 「Maybe someone was over in the shadows, and I missed them.」

LABEL: 0x7311
STRING: 「We checked every corner of the warehouse with Tokiwa-san this morning when we went to pick up food.」

LABEL: 0x7365
STRING: 「There was no sign of anyone inside...」

LABEL: 0x73A5
STRING: 「Isn't that right, Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x7475
STRING: 「That's right. Even a Koropokkur would've had a hard time hiding there.」

LABEL: 0x74CE
STRING: That was a subtle reference that you either understood or didn't...

LABEL: 0x7596
STRING: 「Oh, well, that's good then.」

LABEL: 0x75C0
STRING: 「Wait... That reminds me of how we found Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x75FF
STRING: Reiri had been unconscious like she was dead inside the dark warehouse.

LABEL: 0x7643
STRING: If there was someone like her, someone who had yet gone unnoticed by anyone else――

LABEL: 0x76E0
STRING: 「Oh, yeah!」

LABEL: 0x7703
STRING: My thoughts were interrupted by Touri's voice.

LABEL: 0x7733
STRING: Touri, who boldly raised her voice, continued in a reserved manner, however.

LABEL: 0x77E9
STRING: 「You know, about her...」

LABEL: 0x7813
STRING: 「I need to go check on Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x784C
STRING: ...Ah, right.

LABEL: 0x786C
STRING: Since I delivered the meal earlier, Touri had yet to see Reiri's face this morning.

LABEL: 0x78D0
STRING: Looks like I had done something bad by accident.

LABEL: 0x790C
STRING: It was a little better than yesterday since we knew where she was, but...

LABEL: 0x7956
STRING: Still, it was a concern.

LABEL: 0x7986
STRING: 「Oh, and while you're at it, may I ask you to take the dishes?」

LABEL: 0x7A2E
STRING: 「Sure!」

LABEL: 0x7AA3
STRING: 「Oh, should I have someone accompany me?」

LABEL: 0x7AE8
STRING: 「All right, I'll go with you.」

LABEL: 0x7B2F
STRING: I handed the keycard to Touri.

LABEL: 0x7B5D
STRING: She got up and was about to head to my room when...

LABEL: 0x7B9B
STRING: She stopped a moment later.

LABEL: 0x7BBD
STRING: I wondered if she'd forgotten something, and――

LABEL: 0x7C3E
STRING: She spun around on her heel and stood there facing me.

LABEL: 0x7C90
STRING: ...Close.

LABEL: 0x7CA8
STRING: Even though this was better than being face-to-face with Hiragino,

LABEL: 0x7CF6
STRING: it was a bit nerve-wracking being this close to a girl like her.

LABEL: 0x7D2C
STRING: 「? W-What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x7D80
STRING: Touri bowed deeply, seemingly having made up her mind about something.

LABEL: 0x7EBA
STRING: Thank you very much!」

LABEL: 0x7EE9
STRING: Thank you.

LABEL: 0x7F03
STRING: Her words were sudden.

LABEL: 0x7F1D
STRING: Gratitude.

LABEL: 0x7F31
STRING: ――That was wrong.

LABEL: 0x7F4B
STRING: Wrong.

LABEL: 0x7F61
STRING: She was wrong.

LABEL: 0x7F91
STRING: I threw out words evasively.

LABEL: 0x7FB7
STRING: But she didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x8045
STRING: 「Um, I didn't get a chance to thank you properly yesterday...」

LABEL: 0x8092
STRING: She didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x8118
STRING: 「Thank you for helping Reiri――」

LABEL: 0x8151
STRING: She didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x817C
STRING: 「You're like a hero, лл-san!」

LABEL: 0x81B5
STRING: ――In an instant.

LABEL: 0x81CD
STRING: I was grabbing onto Touri's shoulders with both hands.

LABEL: 0x828F
STRING: 「Ouch――」

LABEL: 0x82B0
STRING: 「You're wrong!」

LABEL: 0x82C8
STRING: 「I'm not... a hero!」

LABEL: 0x831A
STRING: I was at my limit.

LABEL: 0x8338
STRING: It was simply impossible.

LABEL: 0x835E
STRING: I couldn't let this go on like this――

LABEL: 0x8390
STRING: It was me who got her involved in this. For me to receive praise from her now――

LABEL: 0x83D6
STRING: That was just...

LABEL: 0x844F
STRING: How could I bear something like that?!

LABEL: 0x847D
STRING: The air around me, which had been casual until now, suddenly darkened at my sudden outburst.

LABEL: 0x84D1
STRING: I could feel their eyes all over me.

LABEL: 0x84F7
STRING: And in their spotlight were me,

LABEL: 0x85CF
STRING: and Touri.

LABEL: 0x85E9
STRING: Touri had a frozen smile and darted her eyes around like she was more bewildered than terrified, even as she was being shouted at.

LABEL: 0x865E
STRING: 「What...」

LABEL: 0x8678
STRING: 「What are you talking about, лл-sa――」

LABEL: 0x86A9
STRING: 「You're wrong...」

LABEL: 0x86C7
STRING: 「It's not true...」

LABEL: 0x86F6
STRING: 「Wrong... What's wrong...?」

LABEL: 0x8779
STRING: 「Because if you hadn't gone to check the rear section back then, she would've――」

LABEL: 0x87CC
STRING: 「Stop it!!」

LABEL: 0x8847
STRING: When I screamed, unable to bear it any longer, Touri's body stiffened, this time with a look of fear on her face.

LABEL: 0x889F
STRING: Fear.

LABEL: 0x88B3
STRING: Fear, disgust, hatred...

LABEL: 0x88D7
STRING: That was exactly what I deserved.

LABEL: 0x8964
STRING: 「Just stop it, Touri...」

LABEL: 0x898A
STRING: 「I don't deserve to hear those words...」

LABEL: 0x89E6
STRING: 「...It's all my fault... Everything...」

LABEL: 0x8A18
STRING: Words choked with emotion.

LABEL: 0x8A3C
STRING: Touri had asked me what was wrong out of concern.

LABEL: 0x8A89
STRING: 「I'm... sorry for... saying those things...」

LABEL: 0x8AC0
STRING: 「Don't apologize!」

LABEL: 0x8AE0
STRING: 「Don't apologize... That'll...」

LABEL: 0x8B14
STRING: 「Just make me more miserable...」

LABEL: 0x8B5C
STRING: The person I hurt felt sorry for me――

LABEL: 0x8B86
STRING: Without being forgiven by anyone――

LABEL: 0x8BAE
STRING: How miserable would it be to accept it foolishly?

LABEL: 0x8C02
STRING: I wasn't strong enough to keep living a happy dream like that.

LABEL: 0x8CA9
STRING: ――What the hell is it I'm trying to find?

LABEL: 0x8CD9
STRING: What was I wishing for?

LABEL: 0x8D5C
STRING: ...I slowly lowered my arms from Touri's shoulders.

LABEL: 0x8D96
STRING: She wasn't smiling anymore.

LABEL: 0x8E2C
STRING: 「...I just wanted to thank you...」

LABEL: 0x8E6D
STRING: She looked frightened, with slight tears in the corner of her eyes.

LABEL: 0x8EA5
STRING: I felt a weight on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0x8F04
STRING: 「Just... calm down a little bit.」

LABEL: 0x8F2F
STRING: Hiragino's eyes had no hint of blame in them.

LABEL: 0x8F5D
STRING: However, I sensed a firm will that not only admonished, but also warned me.

LABEL: 0x8F9F
STRING: Touri took a step back as Tokiwa held her.

LABEL: 0x8FE9
STRING: Yukari stepped between Touri and me.

LABEL: 0x9087
STRING: 「Please calm down.」

LABEL: 0x90A9
STRING: 「The reality is that you saved Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x913E
STRING: 「It's something to be admired, whatever you might think of yourself――」

LABEL: 0x91E6
STRING: 「No... it's not...」

LABEL: 0x920C
STRING: 「Do you understand what I'm saying?」

LABEL: 0x923A
STRING: 「It's all my fault...」

LABEL: 0x92F5
STRING: Yukari opened her mouth but was hesitant to say anything.

LABEL: 0x9331
STRING: With a throb, pain I'd forgotten hit me, and I held my head.

LABEL: 0x93F8
STRING: Visions were swirling inside my mind.

LABEL: 0x9418
STRING: The great many dead...

LABEL: 0x9436
STRING: And it was orchestrated by none other than――

LABEL: 0x94E7
STRING: 「Ah.」

LABEL: 0x950C
STRING: 「...лл-san!」

LABEL: 0x9594
STRING: Touri shook off Tokiwa's arms and ran to me, her fingertips touching me.

LABEL: 0x9653
STRING: 「Don't call me that name!」

LABEL: 0x96F7
STRING: I waved my arm to brush her off.

LABEL: 0x9721
STRING: ――Silence.

LABEL: 0x9739
STRING: Once again, the lobby was engulfed in irrevocable silence.

LABEL: 0x9775
STRING: I could no longer look anyone in the eye and kept my head down.

LABEL: 0x9814
STRING: 「...Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x9830
STRING: No one spoke.

LABEL: 0x9850
STRING: No one said... anything...

LABEL: 0x9878
STRING: Only time kept on flowing.

LABEL: 0x989C
STRING: In front of me stood Touri, looking lost.

LABEL: 0x98DE
STRING: Why? ...Why was she so...

LABEL: 0x9916
STRING: In the silent atmosphere, I tried to retrace my memories.

LABEL: 0x9A8E
STRING: 「――Who the hell are you?」

LABEL: 0x9ADB
STRING: 「My name is...」

LABEL: 0x9C14
STRING: ――I see.

LABEL: 0x9C2E
STRING: At that time... Touri wasn't there...

LABEL: 0x9C5E
STRING: 「Touri, I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x9D09
STRING: I tried to keep my composure and apologize, pretending to be normal.

LABEL: 0x9D69
STRING: Apologize?

LABEL: 0x9D7D
STRING: ...Yes.

LABEL: 0x9D97
STRING: I was obligated to tell Touri what I had done.

LABEL: 0x9DD3
STRING: And I owed her an apology...

LABEL: 0x9DFD
STRING: 「I'm sorry. There's something I haven't told you. Actually, this accident――」

LABEL: 0x9E4C
STRING: 「Wait!」

LABEL: 0x9E69
STRING: Hiragino stopped me as I was about to say something.

LABEL: 0x9EAD
STRING: I turned around toward him, not understanding what he was getting at as he whispered to me forcefully.

LABEL: 0x9F65
STRING: 「Just what were you about to say...?」

LABEL: 0x9F91
STRING: 「And, for who's sake?」

LABEL: 0x9FC0
STRING: For who's――?

LABEL: 0x9FDC
STRING: That wasn't... something I had considered...

LABEL: 0xA020
STRING: I glanced at the girl in front of me.

LABEL: 0xA0AD
STRING: If she found out that I was the one who caused this accident...

LABEL: 0xA0EF
STRING: Just how would she react, being so young?

LABEL: 0xA123
STRING: My confession of sin wouldn't help anyone.

LABEL: 0xA153
STRING: The only one it would save――

LABEL: 0xA1EE
STRING: ――Would be me.

LABEL: 0xA2D5
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0xA2FC
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0xA316
STRING: 「It's nothing...」

LABEL: 0xA356
STRING: In the end, all I wanted was to save myself.

LABEL: 0xA38C
STRING: Thinking that it was right to confess everything, or that it was dishonest to hide it...

LABEL: 0xA3DC
STRING: All those reasons were just excuses I'd made up to make myself feel better.

LABEL: 0xA42C
STRING: ...Just how low could I go?

LABEL: 0xA533
STRING: 「He's a bit confused too, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0xA568
STRING: Hiragino followed up as I slumped my shoulders.

LABEL: 0xA5BF
STRING: 「As you said, he went down alone into the dark depths of the sea to search for survivors.」

LABEL: 0xA619
STRING: 「He must've some scars to bear from that.」

LABEL: 0xA645
STRING: 「...Please try to understand.」

LABEL: 0xA67C
STRING: 「...I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0xA6CB
STRING: 「You were going to go check on Reiri-kun, right?」

LABEL: 0xA6FF
STRING: 「Come on, let's get going. Maybe she's been up for a while already and bored out of her mind.」

LABEL: 0xA75A
STRING: 「Eh,

LABEL: 0xA7C3
STRING: ah, okay!」

LABEL: 0xA7E0
STRING: Hiragino took Touri with her, who was looking at me with concern, even if he had to push her a little.

LABEL: 0xA838
STRING: Sorry, Touri. But honestly, I appreciate it.

LABEL: 0xA874
STRING: I needed some time...

LABEL: 0xA8D2
STRING: ...However.

LABEL: 0xA8EC
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0xA906
STRING: 「One thing before you go...」

LABEL: 0xA997
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0xA9B8
STRING: He asked back in a stern tone.

LABEL: 0xA9E0
STRING: He wanted to end this conversation as soon as possible.

LABEL: 0xAA24
STRING: And I agreed with him, but...

LABEL: 0xAA66
STRING: ――It couldn't end here.

LABEL: 0xAA84
STRING: I just couldn't let it end like this.

LABEL: 0xAAB0
STRING: Nothing would change.

LABEL: 0xAB8C
STRING: Touri, Tokiwa,

LABEL: 0xACA3
STRING: Yukari, and Hiragino... I had been lying to%Nthem all.

LABEL: 0xAD07
STRING: No. That was wrong.

LABEL: 0xAD21
STRING: All I had done was lie.

LABEL: 0xAD47
STRING: And to end it...

LABEL: 0xAD69
STRING: I needed to reveal myself to them.

LABEL: 0xAD99
STRING: 「Actually, there's something I haven't told you yet.」

LABEL: 0xADD7
STRING: 「Sorry... I couldn't find the right time to tell you.」

LABEL: 0xAF21
STRING: 「My name's not лл.」

LABEL: 0xB012
STRING: 「My real name is...」

LABEL: 0xB049
STRING: 「...Hitose.」

LABEL: 0xB072
STRING: ...Huh?

LABEL: 0xB0F4
STRING: 「Your name is Hitose.」

LABEL: 0xB122
STRING: 「Isn't that right?」

LABEL: 0xB145
STRING: How does he――

LABEL: 0xB17F
STRING: And then.

LABEL: 0xB195
STRING: There was another person who was surprised at the same time as I was.

LABEL: 0xB24B
STRING: 「Hitose...

LABEL: 0xB2BB
STRING: Katagiri Hitose?!」

LABEL: 0xB2F6
STRING: Why――

LABEL: 0xB30C
STRING: That name――

LABEL: 0xB39F
STRING: Why

LABEL: 0xB3AE
STRING: do they know that name?
